EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your item {!Case.ReferenceID__c} is due for delivery today
Hang on, what if I’m not home? Here’s what will happen:
If nobody’s home we’ll still deliver your item, provided we can leave it in a safe place. Otherwise it will be dropped at a Post Office for your collection.
For information on your how you can control your deliveries in future, please see here.
If you have any further questions about the delivery of your article, please reply to this email and we will be happy to assist you.
Thank you,
Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
